job_details.Functieomschrijving:
About the Role: what can you expect?

   We are looking for a new team member with strong expertise in all aspects of generative AI, in particular large language models (LLMs). The office is located close to Amsterdam in Hoofddorp, the Netherlands, and we offer a hybrid setup with limited home office possibilities.

   The ideal candidate has an excellent track record on using their skills to support and enhance business processes and outcome. They are strong in communication and eager to extend their competencies, both technical and regarding collaboration with colleagues and clients across the company.

   You will be responsible for the development, validation, and performance of the solutions you are working on. Your peers are data scientists and platform engineers, and you will jointly deliver text analytics solutions across the firm. Your focus will be to ensure that Swiss Re's maturity regarding large language model usage remains industry-leading., * You will develop LLM-based solutions for information extraction, classification, question answering and more, leveraging prompt tuning or model fine-tuning as appropriate.
     * Together with your colleagues, you will contribute to our broader tech strategy for generative AI, involving LLM Ops and systematic re-use of specific models and platforms.
     * You will closely collaborate and coordinate with (re)insurance professionals, and translate business requirements into technical requirements.
       About the Team: Join us!
       Group Data Services (GDS) support Swiss Re's business functions in generating insights from structured and unstructured data. As part of GDS, the Document Analytics Solutions team builds and owns end-to-end solutions and services around text mining, document analytics, and NLP.
job_details.full_text:
Senior NLP Engineer (Large Language Models)

About the Role: what can you expect?

   We are looking for a new team member with strong expertise in all aspects of generative AI, in particular large language models (LLMs). The office is located close to Amsterdam in Hoofddorp, the Netherlands, and we offer a hybrid setup with limited home office possibilities.

   The ideal candidate has an excellent track record on using their skills to support and enhance business processes and outcome. They are strong in communication and eager to extend their competencies, both technical and regarding collaboration with colleagues and clients across the company.

   You will be responsible for the development, validation, and performance of the solutions you are working on. Your peers are data scientists and platform engineers, and you will jointly deliver text analytics solutions across the firm. Your focus will be to ensure that Swiss Re's maturity regarding large language model usage remains industry-leading., * You will develop LLM-based solutions for information extraction, classification, question answering and more, leveraging prompt tuning or model fine-tuning as appropriate.
     * Together with your colleagues, you will contribute to our broader tech strategy for generative AI, involving LLM Ops and systematic re-use of specific models and platforms.
     * You will closely collaborate and coordinate with (re)insurance professionals, and translate business requirements into technical requirements.
       About the Team: Join us!
       Group Data Services (GDS) support Swiss Re's business functions in generating insights from structured and unstructured data. As part of GDS, the Document Analytics Solutions team builds and owns end-to-end solutions and services around text mining, document analytics, and NLP.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing and deploying LLM-based solutions, including prompt tuning and model fine-tuning. It also mentions LLM Ops and building end-to-end solutions for text analytics and NLP, aligning strongly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer. While there's mention of data scientists and platform engineers, the primary focus is on generative AI applications and user-facing systems built around LLMs.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'develop LLM-based solutions for information extraction, classification, question answering and more, leveraging prompt tuning or model fine-tuning as appropriate' directly describes the creation and adaptation of models, specifically generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: develop LLM-based solutions for information extraction, classification, question answering and more, leveraging prompt tuning or model fine-tuning as appropriate

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'builds and owns end-to-end solutions and services around text mining, document analytics, and NLP' implies the development of complete systems and services, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: builds and owns end-to-end solutions and services around text mining, document analytics, and NLP

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'contribute to our broader tech strategy for generative AI, involving LLM Ops' directly mentions LLM Operations, which is a key component of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: contribute to our broader tech strategy for generative AI, involving LLM Ops

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'support and enhance business processes and outcome' and 'translate business requirements into technical requirements' indicate a need to understand business needs and align technical solutions with them.
job_tasks.phrase: support and enhance business processes and outcome

job_tasks.phrase: translate business requirements into technical requirements
